===Hydro Tulpa===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Fist Strike
|desc_1      = Attacks with its fist, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
|name_2      = Spear Toss
|desc_2      = Throws a water-formed spear at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' ('''90% ATK''' while enhanced) as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Hydro Tulpa Spear Toss 2
|caption_2_2 = Enhanced

|desc_3      = Swings a water-formed hammer 3 times, dealing '''60% ATK''', '''62.5% ATK''', '''65% ATK''' ('''90% ATK''', '''92.5% ATK''', '''95% ATK''' while enhanced) as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Hydro Tulpa Hammer Whirl 2
|caption_3_2 = Enhanced
|name_4      = Sword Combo
|desc_4      = Swings a water-formed sword, then attacks its arm, dealing '''60% ATK''', '''65% ATK''' ('''90% ATK''', '''95% ATK''' while enhanced) as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
|caption_4   = Normal
|file_4_2    = Hydro Tulpa Sword Combo 2
|caption_4_2 = Enhanced
|name_5      = Triple Lancestrike
|desc_5      = Forms 3 lances which strike down near itself, each dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}. Many smaller lances will also strike down across the arena, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
|name_6      = Absorb Half-Tulpa
|desc_6      = During battle, a [[Half-Tulpa]] will spawn every '''12.5s'''. The Hydro Tulpa will periodically absorb a Half-Tulpa to enter an enhanced state for one attack (two attacks if in the [[Spiral Abyss]]): AoE and DMG dealt are increased, and [[RES]] to all DMG is increased by '''45%'''.

==Trivia==

=== Etymology ===

* {{W|Tulpa}} is a materialized being or thought-form, typically in human form, that is created through spiritual practice and intense concentration.
* {{Lang|{{w|Egregore}}|el=ἐγρήγορος}} is a concept in Western esotericism of a non-physical entity or thoughtform that arises from the collective thoughts and emotions of a distinct group of individuals.
